title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4211.2 - Minors not to be employed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4211.2 - Minors not to be employed

State Regulations

No person under the age of 16 years shall be employed in
or about the track by any association except as may be permitted by the
applicable laws of the State of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4211.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
